name: ObelixAndCo
body:
# Welcome to ObelixAndCo!
[This site](www.ObelixAndCo.GitHub.io "ObelixAndCo.github.io") is for @ObelixAndCo. I'm Obelix, a creator of web content and a citizen of the internet.

### What is this?
This is a site for my projects. I don't know what they will be yet, but it is sure to be cool.

### Who are you again?

I'm Obelix. I am a creator, writer, reader, podcast-enthusiast, audiophile, programmer and amateur mathematician. I spend most of my time online, connected, and hope to provide you with some good content, whether that be videos on [YouTube](www.youtube.com), infographics on [/r/dataisbeautiful](www.reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful), webgames on [itch.io](www.itch.io) or programs on [Github](www.github.com).

### Where can I find you?
 * The best place to reach me is on Twitter [@ObelixAndCo](https://twitter.com/ObelixAndCo/). 
 * I'm setting up a YouTube channel, which you'll see soon here. I'm waiting until YouTube completely drops Google+ integration before confirming my custom url.
 * You can also PM me on reddit. I'm [/u/ObelixAndCo](http://www.reddit.com/user/obelixandco).
 * I'm also (obviously) on GitHub!

## Thanks for visiting my website, and stick around for more!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
